replies.body: Game has completely gone to shit, Fuck you riot.
Then leave, no one wants you here with that attitude
The way the game is now, nerfs to damage are better than buffs. 80% of champs can kill someone within 5 seconds now...

Within 5 seconds?

Man I wish I lasted that long against 80% of champs..
when does the morg rework come out?

Buffing Azir's late game... Why late game?
Nerfing sylas' heal by 5-10-15-20...
Conq looks retarded as fuck
One day Riot, one day.
ITT: REEEEE! Why didn't you do exactly what I wanted? Me, a casual, non professional player obviously has a much better idea about balance!!!!
And those casual, non professional players make up %99.9 of the player base...
When is this year’s Ryze rework scheduled to come out?
What do they mean by "bootless walk animation"?

Champions have different animations for slowed/wounded (CC), normal, fast etc. I don't really play those champs so I can't articulate exactly what the change was, but basically expanding their animations to feel smoother and to match the new stuff.

tl;dr small QoL animation update.
why is lux smaller in game?
Sad to see riot still haven't fixed Rakan's R bug
Hey Riot, how come I can't see Nunu's W range when I hover it anymore?
